   (ii) UYO accepts ND/ NCE / HND in relevant programmes plus the 
UTME requirements  
(iii) CALABAR accepts NCE credit level which should include 
Geography and ND in related programme.  
(iv) BENIN accepts ND upper credit/HND lower credit in Town 
Planning, Estate Management or Environmental 
Management and Geographic Information System; NCE 
overall meri t with a credit in Geography. Direct Entry 
candidates must also satisfy the UTME requirements.  
(v) DELSU and AAUA require one (1) other 'A' level Social Science 
subject and accept NCE credit in Geography; ND upper credit, 
HND lower credit in Town Planning or in related 
programmes/subjects. DELSU accepts Land Surveying, 
Environmental Resource Management, Estate Management 
or other related programmes.  
(vi) LASU accepts 'A' level pass in any one (1) of Economics, 
Government, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.  
  
UTME  
(i) CALABAR accepts two (2) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Economics, Government, Agricultural Science, Physics, 
Chemistry and Biology.  
(ii) BENIN accepts TC II overall merit.  
(iii) OOU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) Social Science 
subjects.  
(iv) AAUA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) Social Science or 
Science subjects.  
(v) DELSU accepts Geography, and any other Social Science 
Subject.  
(vi) EKSU requires ‘O’ level credit pass in one (1) of the other 
two  
(2) subjects to be a Science or Social Science subject.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) OOU - Geography and any two (2) Social Science subjects.  
(ii) DELSU – Geography, Mathematics and one (1) other Social 
Science subject
